Name: The Conners
Title: There Won't Be Blood
Desc: The school bans certain Halloween costumes and it sets off an argument between Dan and Darlene.
LongDescription: An email from the school banning certain Halloween costumes, including Mark's, sets off an argument between Dan and Darlene; Jackie introduces someone to the family at the Halloween party and insists that Dan vet him, but she immediately regrets it.
